markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Resilient Touch](/Feats.aspx?ID=1682) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 120 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Blessed One](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=51) (Level 12)

**Prerequisites**
devotion spell ([_lay on hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=395))

</column>

---

Your healing energies create an aura of protection that defends your allies against more than just blades and arrows. An ally that recovers Hit Points from your [_lay on hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=395) gains a +1 status bonus to their saving throws until the end of their next turn.
name: Resilient Touch
